leadership training, and summer camp.

all_units.meeting_location: 10 Billerica Rd, All Saints' Episcopal Church, Chelmsford MA 01824
all_units.description:
Crew 4048 (4,000-48) is just getting started, but we have big plans...to climb all the 4,000ft peaks in New Hampshire. There are 48 of them, hence the 4048 crew number.
 
Please contact us if you would like to be part of group founding this Venture Crew.

For current Scouting America members there is NO FEE to join.

Onwards to adventure!

all_units.chartered_organization: Friends of New England Base Camp
all_units.description:
Troop Meetings are Wednesdays 7-8:30PM during days when school is in session. Meetings are held at St. Mary's Parish, 25 North Rd, Chelmsford, MA 01824. 
Troop 77 is mid-sized, has active Scouts for weekly meetings and has great parent participation and leadership. 
Troop 77 is also great for those families who want to balance other activities like sports and music, AND scouts/camping.
Minimal fundraising is required of parents.

all_units.description: Venturing Crew 7 is a co-ed program that is youth led.  The youth hold monthly meetings, plan monthly activities and plan one annual High Adventure of a week or more duration.
